bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for The Usage of Terms Commonly Employed In the Field of Large-Signal Vector Network Analysis
IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for The Usage of Terms Commonly Employed In the Field of Large-Signal Vector Network Analysis

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This Recommended Practice defines common terms in large-signal vector network analysis. Some fundamental terms used in small-signal vector network analysis that are also commonly used in large-signal vector network analysis are covered as well.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
